name: Lobby
description:
A room on the smaller side. 
it has big open archways leading to the two biggest rooms and a smaller glass door leading to the caf√©.

name: Cafe
description:
Quite tiny place with lots of plants and string lights. 
there is only a few people here and in the back of the room you see a glass door leading to the gift shop and a glowing exit sign.

name: Gift shop
description:
Very cluttered space filled with fish-themed plushies, magnets, shirts, bags and many others. 
The local cashier seems...distracted by his phone, maybe best if you don't talk to him much.

name: Restaurant
description: A very spacious clean room wit blue walls and lots of tables and chairs. The space is crowded with hungry visitors and all the staff here seems really busy

name: Saltwater Area
description: Very spacious light room with high ceilings and subtle blue lighting

name: Kids section
description:
You are in a heavily lighted room with a lot of kids screaming and bright colors everywhere, the room has a lot of decorative elements and seems very fun for exploring.
 It even has a small cinema with a fish documentary.

name: Freshwater Area
description: Narrow and dark room with green toned lighting. It's very quiet and peaceful here.

name: unique animals
description:
Probably the biggest room and surely the main attraction of this building.
You see a lot of big tanks and huge figurines of octopuses, sharks and penguins, representing their living counterparts.
